Summary Note:
The RM first met Astrid Daantje Peeters at a luxury car show in Amsterdam. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
Astrid Daantje Peeters is a 30 year old and comes from Netherlands.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Astrid Daantje Peeters and Stam tied the knot in 2022. Together they have 1 kid called Ilona.
Education Background:
In 2014, Astrid finished her secondary school education at Scholengroep Carmel Maastricht.
Astrid completed her university education at Wittenborg University of Applied Sciences in 2018.
Occupation History:
Astrid Daantje Peeters is a 30 year old Investment Director from Netherlands.
In 2018, Astrid Daantje Peeters started working as a Family Office Manager at Rabobank Private Banking, marking the beginning of her successful career.
At ING Private Banking, she held the position of Investment Director from 2022 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 50000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She owns villa in Enschede, where she resides. It is worth 2590000 EUR.


Following the passing of her grandfather, a successful Tech Entrepreneur, she received an inheritance of 4200000 EUR in 2018, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
